en.title: Congratulations! FusionExcel Team wins Chess Championship.
en.content:
Congratulations to the FusionExcel Team, comprising 4 of Malaysia's top chess players (FM Nicholas Chan, FM Mok Tze Meng, FM Lim Yee Weng and FM Ooi Chern Ee) for winning the Tun Syed Zahiruddin Cup (Open Chess Team Tournament) 2007/2008 ! This prestigious tournament was held on 16 March 2008 at the Dewan Sri Tanjung , Kolej Kediaman Tun Syed Zahiruddin (KK9), Universiti Malaya. 

Once again, FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant provides the winning edge!.
